pr_title: Remove CSS formatting from spotless apply

timeline.message:
Remove CSS formatting from spotless apply

Remove 'postcss' formatter, it keeps running into 501 errors when
spotlessApply is run locally:

```
Execution failed for task ':spotlessStyling'.
> Unexpected response status code at /prettier/format [HTTP 501] -- (Error while formatting: Error: Couldn't resolve parser "postcss")
```

timeline.bodyText: The parser is now just called css, in case you want to change it
timeline.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText:
No joy simply changing it:
Execution failed for task ':spotlessStyling'.
> Unexpected response status code at /prettier/format [HTTP 501] -- (Error while formatting: TypeError: text.trimEnd is not a function)
replies.author: DanVanAtta

replies.bodyText:
Ah, it's this error again. It seems like the newer 'prettier' requires a newer version of NodeJS, which introduces a String.trimEnd function.
But nevermind then
replies.author: RoiEXLab
